item.title: My case for veganism
item.description: I make a case for veganism and why you probably already agree with all the reasons you should be vegan. And how I wish people would reframe the topic, to make it less contentious, emotional and, frankly, annoying.

item.title: A day in the life of an Omnivore
item.description: I take a toung-in-cheek look at how I imagine the life of a meat eater to look. At least based on my own experience.
